title: Tom Brady linked to 49ers, Did you read all 456 pages of the CBA!? (Football 3/6)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to address continued links between Tom Brady and the 49ers (3:20). Does the rumored move make any sense? Would it be an upgrade for San Francisco? With free agency a week-and-a-half away, the guys analyze all the latest buzz around Brady. The 456-page CBA was released to the public on Thursday and at least 2 Superfriends managed to read most of it (19:30). What are the most 'interesting' points in the document? We attempt to simply things for you. And finally, a trade took place with the Chargers receiving Trai Turner and the Panthers getting Russell Okung (49:30). Who came out on top of this deal? Find out on this Friday edition of the Pick Six podcast.


'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS @johnbreech, @seanjwagner
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/

To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
